title: FABRIK Quality cargo door sun canopy Vintage style

posts.content:
Now available from FABRIK Interiors, Quality Candy striped cargo door Sun Canopies. We use a premium quality German fabric, hard wearing. tear-resistant, teflon coated, water-repellent, UV-resistant, mould and oil resistant.

Very strong magnets in the hem, tie down tabs just in case a helicopter lands next to you.

European oak door support.

Our canopies have a unique fixing system and are high quality also (No wooden poles and clamps needed in the gutter) Nice clean lines. The molded rubber gutter seal means there is no risk of damage to the paintwork on your bus.

If you want the perfect vintage look then you have come to the right place.

£85ea collect at show or £12.95 UK postage

Red/white, Blue/white, Yellow/white, Green/white etc Solid vintage stripes. Blue is back on stock + a range of solid colours.







More Pics when the sun comes out : )

Taking orders for Brighton Breeze.
Can you show a picture of one in use on a bus please????
Will they be held on with guide ropes like the other repro ones?? Personally the orginal wooded bar/press studs ones were loads better.
Would be interested in an orange and white one depending on the pictures

Will add pictures shortly.

The canopy is secured to the gutter rail by a unique high quality rubber fixing (strong and secure). The sides of canopy have very strong magnets sewn in that hold it in place. The doors are kept from closing by a pole located in the canopy. (We recommend that you fit door check straps also).

No strings, clamps, required. But we have installed loops and cord is included if you want added security in windy conditions.


Also only the colours mentioned above are available in the top quality fabric in the stripes.

We can get a whole range of the same fabric in solid colours and orange is available.

Get some pictures up Dude, you're getting some interest here but we need to see how they look fitted to a Bus! I could be interested in a green and white one.
Cheer John.

Interested in a blue and white - when is the last date i can order so you can have them ready for Brighton ?

Cheers Brad
Interested in a orange one but need to see fitted photos please
Orange and white one too, but pics please?

Interested in blue one mike pls - pics ??
Thx

Would be green/white for me.
But as others say, need a picture first please.

I will get the pics up Thursday evening.

Will have a couple at Brighton Breeze for sale. Come and check it out on my van.

Taking orders for Brighton Breeze.

Orders taken after BB weekend will be at the non-discounted price of £85.

All orders taken before and during the weekend will be at the Special offer price £65

We are using oak for the door spacer support, this will be clear coated for weather protection.

For those looking for a top quality item " Look no further" FABRIK is where its at

Come and see one fitted to our bus at Brighton Breeze.

No pics yet, maybe this weekend if the rain stops.

Please note: blue/white is currently out of stock with our supplier. They have promised to deliver the fabric in 4-6 weeks.
All other colours available, we will have stock at Brighton Breeze. NOW BACK IN STOCK
Interested but really need to see a picture mate. Pictures speak a thousand words when selling something
